column4: Hi. Quick question.. Looking for a way to make X (in Ubuntu) reload xorg.conf without having to restart GNOME (unlike /etc/init.d/gdm restart). I think it's possible because I can do it via the GUI nVidia panel (X Server Settings) but I can't figure out a command line for my script. Any ideas?
speaking of xorg, do you know how to check if a certain module is loaded? i'm trying to debug my touchpad.
yeah, but i'm not sure, because my touchpad doesn't seem to work at all..
